headline: Republicans Are Telling Voters To Boycott Trump’s Ohio Rally
author: Jason Easley
sentences: Ohio, just like Georgia and Pennsylvania, is enduring a primary that is total chaos, but in the Buckeye State voters may express their displeasure with Trump’s meddling in their election with some loud boos.

Here is the message from Josh Mandel’s Ohio allies, the Ohio Values Voters:
In #OHSEN, @JoshMandelOhio's allies are calling for a boycott of Saturday's Trump rally with @JDVance1 and others.
Of course, this is the primary where a fistfight nearly broke out between candidates Mike Gibbons on Josh Mandel, so Trump just threw gasoline on the situation when he endorsed Vance.

pic.twitter.com/3N0vtCSyDN
— Luke Thompson (@ltthompso) April 21, 2022
Trump has turned the Ohio Republican Senate primary into a dumpster fire.
Trump has lost much influence that even Republicans are being urged to go to his rally and boo his chosen candidate.
Vance might be able to pull enough of his voters away to hand the nomination to Mike Gibbons.

Ohio Republicans are asking voters to boycott Trump’s rally with J.D.
